home.slogan: Create appointments and get on the same page with your people!
home.testEnvironmentBanner: This is a test environment of {{value}}. Please do not fill in personal data.

poll.paused: You can't edit this poll, because it's paused.
poll.continueEverytime: You can continue this poll at anytime.
poll.addDetails: Add further details to your poll!
poll.editAlert: Attention, you are editing a running poll.
poll.editSaveLastStep: In step "4" you can save your changes.
poll.downloadIcs: Download this date as .ics-File to import it to your calendar. Check the voting of your participants in the description.
poll.downloadCsv: Download the table of participants and their voting. You can import it into Excel and plan your event.

delete.willBeDeleted: The appointment request is deleted one week after the last possible appointment date.

date.startInvalid: Please set a valid start date.
date.startFuture: Please set a start date, wich is in the future.
date.startAfterEnd: Please set a valid start and end date combination. The end date must be after the start date.
date.noStart: Please set a start date. If there is an end date, there has to be a start date.
date.inPast: Please enter a valid start date. The start date must be in the future.
date.noValue: There must be at least one date.
date.tooMuchValues: More than 100 dates are not possible.

links.share: Share your poll with the title:
links.invite: You can invite others to your poll with this link.
links.loosingLink: ATTENTION: If this link is not saved, it will be lost.
links.change: You can change your poll with this link.
links.satisfactionSurvey: How satisfied is our service? Do you have any suggestions for making the service more enjoyable? We would be pleased if you would let us know your opinion with a few clicks. Your feedback will be collected by the development team at Dataport AÃ¶R.

email.creation: I have created an appointment survey to find a common date
email.admin: This is the admin URL for editing the following poll

password.minimum: (min. 8 characters, one number, one capital letter, one special character)
password.locked: This poll is protected with a password
password.enter: Enter the password to participate in this poll.
password.securePoll: Secure your poll with a password!
password.setMinimum: Please enter a password with min. 8 characters, one number, one capital letter and one special character.
password.noMatch: The entered passwords do not match.

tos.accept: Please accept the privacy declaration and the terms of use.
